name: goautoscore
description: Automatic scoring for finished Go games

scripts.optimize: npm run optimize:js && npm run optimize:css
scripts.copy:development: npm run copy:scripts && npm run copy:html
scripts.copy:production: npm run copy:scripts && npm run copy:html
scripts.build:development: npm run elm:development && npm run sass:generate && npm run copy:development
scripts.build:staging: npm run elm:development && npm run sass:generate && npm run copy:development
scripts.build:production: npm run elm:production && npm run sass:generate && npm run copy:production && npm run optimize
scripts.install:staging: npm run elm:install && npm run build:staging
scripts.install:production: npm run elm:install && npm run build:production
scripts.watch: npm run watch:elm & npm run watch:scripts & npm run watch:scss & npm run watch:html

author: Lode Lesage
